DataListSpec.Name: Active Held Lapsed Non Sponsorship Recurring Gifts
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing active or held or lapsed non-sponsorship RG records.
DataListSpec.Author: Mark Sellers

SPDataList.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CONSTITUENT_ACTIVE_HELD_LAPSED_NON_SPONSORSHIP_RG ( @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier ) as set nocount on;
select c.ID, rev.ID as RECURRINGGIFTID, desig.USERID as FUNDID, coalesce (desig.VANITYNAME, desig.NAME) as FUNDNAME, revschedule.STARTDATE, revschedule.STATUS, rev.Amount as RGAMOUNT, revschedule.FREQUENCY, case when revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE > revschedule.ENDDATE then null else revschedule.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE end as NTD, (select top 1 coalesce([PAYMENT].TRANSACTIONAMOUNT, 0) from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY as [RGA] join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as [PAYMENT] on [PAYMENT].ID = [RGA].PAYMENTREVENUEID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION as [REVPAYMENT] on [PAYMENT].FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = [REVPAYMENT].ID where SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID -- I removed this beause it might be good to know the last payment was refunded -- and [REVPAYMENT].TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 order by [REVPAYMENT].DATE desc) as LASTPAYMENTAMOUNT,
(select top 1 cast (rev_payment.DATE as date) from dbo.RECURRINGGIFTACTIVITY rg_act join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONLINEITEM as payment on payment.ID = rg_act.PAYMENTREVENUEID join dbo.FINANCIALTRANSACTION as rev_payment on payment.FINANCIALTRANSACTIONID = rev_payment.ID where SOURCEREVENUEID = rev.ID -- I removed this beause it might be good to know the last payment was refunded -- and rev_payment.TRANSACTIONAMOUNT > 0 order by rev_payment.DATE desc) as LASTPAYMENTDATE,
PAYMENTMETHOD, case when dbo.USR_UFN_CHECK_RECURRINGGIFT_ISHELD(revsplit.ID) = 1 then 'Yes' else '' end as ISHELD, case when ft_ext.ISEFTDECLINED = 1 then 'Yes' else '' end as ISEFTDECLINED, (select DESCRIPTION from DELAYEFTPAYMENTDUEDATECODE where ID = ft_ext.DELAYEFTPAYMENTDUEDATECODEID) as DELAYEFTPAYMENTDUEDATECODE
from dbo.REVENUE rev inner join dbo.REVENUESPLIT revsplit on revsplit.REVENUEID = rev.ID left join dbo.USR_FINANCIALTRANSACTION_EXTENSION ft_ext on rev.ID = ft_ext.ID inner join dbo.DESIGNATION desig on desig.ID = revsplit.DESIGNATIONID inner join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE revschedule on revschedule.ID = rev.ID --REVENUE.ID inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on rev.CONSTITUENTID = c.ID inner join dbo.REVENUEPAYMENTMETHOD rev_paymethod on rev_paymethod.REVENUEID = revsplit.REVENUEID
where not exists (select ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP sp where sp.REVENUESPLITID = revsplit.ID) and revschedule.STATUSCODE in (0,1,5) and c.ID = @CONTEXTID
